name: anvillm-agent
description: Agent for AnviLLM multi-agent workflows with mailbox communication

userPromptSubmit.command: KIRO_PID=$(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID | tr -d ' '); cat $(namespace)/anvillm-session-id-$KIRO_PID 2>/dev/null | xargs -I{} sh -c 'echo running | 9p write agent/{}/state 2>/dev/null' || true

stop.command: KIRO_PID=$(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID | tr -d ' '); cat $(namespace)/anvillm-session-id-$KIRO_PID 2>/dev/null | xargs -I{} sh -c 'echo idle | 9p write agent/{}/state 2>/dev/null' || true
